sn50.1-12:1.5: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ganga nadi pacinaninna pacinapona pacinapabbhara;
sn50.1-12:1.6: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu panca balani bhavento panca balani bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo.
sn50.1-12:1.7: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu panca balani bhavento panca balani bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo?
sn50.1-12:1.8: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhabalam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim,
sn50.1-12:1.12: pannabalam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn50.1-12:1.13: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu panca balani bhavento panca balani bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo”ti.
